xxl.core.binarySearchTrees
Class BBTree

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.binarySearchTrees.BinarySearchTree
      xxl.core.binarySearchTrees.BBTree

public class BBTree
extends BinarySearchTree

A binary tree where the balance of every subtree is bounded. The BBTree provides insertion and exactmatch search in O(log(n)) time.

For a detailed discussion see "Introduction to Algorithms", MIT Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, by Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest.

Constructor Detail

BBTree

public BBTree(Predicate fixAggregate,
              Function fixRotation,
              double alpha,
              double d)
Creates a BBTree.

Parameters:
fixAggregate - Predicate that is called when an aggregate information in the tree might be outdated.
fixRotation - Function that is called when a rotation has occured and rotation information in a node has to become fixed.
alpha - Parameter alpha.
d - Parameter d.

BBTree

public BBTree(Predicate fixAggregate,
              Function fixRotation)
Creates a BBTree with default parameters. This constructor is equivalent to the call of BBTree(fixAggregate,fixRotation,3.0/11.0, 6.0/10.0).

Parameters:
fixAggregate - Predicate that is called when an aggregate information in the tree might be outdated.
fixRotation - Function that is called when a rotation has occured and rotation information in a node has to become fixed.

newNode

public BinarySearchTree.Node newNode(java.lang.Object object,
                                     BinarySearchTree.Node parent)
Description copied from class: BinarySearchTree
Creates and initializes a new node of the tree. The node is inserted into the tree only if the parent is set correctly.

Overrides:

Parameters:
